question.text: Why is it a good idea to plan your journey to avoid busy times?

explanation.text: No one likes to spend time in traffic queues. Try to avoid busy times related to school or work travel. As well as moving vehicles you should also consider congestion caused by parked cars, buses and coaches around schools.
